name: elegiac
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or similar to an elegy (= a sad poem or song, especially remembering someone who has died or something in the past): She is a talented poet and it shows in her elegiac prose. The music is elegiac and pessimistic but also passionately eloquent and uplifting.
More examplesFewer examplesHis tone is becoming ever more elegiac, like a requiem.The mood is mainly elegiac and nostalgic but there are flashes of grim humour.The rapid editing gives way to slow motion and an elegiac soundtrack.
